strapiPost.title: Family Owned Pasta Shop Opens in Springdale
strapiPost.content:
Zelli Pasta, a family-owned and operated pasta producer, just opened on Emma Ave. in Springdale. 

  • A whole lotta pasta: In addition to multiple styles of pasta, Zelli carries meats, cheeses, tomato sauces, kitchen tools, oils, vinegar, spices… basically everything you’d need to whip up the perfect Italian dinner. 
  • A whole box-a pasta: Join the Zelli Pasta Club and you’ll receive 2 boxes of Zelli pasta and a variety of handpicked provisions every month. 

Visit Zelli’s online store HERE.
